welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Carthage, a charming city known for its rich history and southern hospitality. We invite you to explore our quaint streets, enjoy our delicious cuisine, and experience all that Carthage has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Joplin Regional Airport serves all domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Neosho Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Neosho Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network while waiting for their flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atkinson Municipal Airport offers a variety of services for travelers, including check-in, baggage claim, and dining options.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For private and charter flights, the private terminal at Atkinson Municipal Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
